comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain Agency photo of the launch of the Lundin Power Lifeboat:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6083174781/in/photostream/]
Einar Sivard and his bride, aboard for the launching at Coney Island's Rockaway Beach:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5764554979/in/photostream/]
The passengers and crew prepare for launch:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5764554621/in/photostream/]
Launched, the Lundin Power Lifeboat heads for the open sea:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5765103332/in/photostream/]
Another photo of the Lifeboat's test run:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6035107573/]
An earlier version of the Lundin Lifeboat, in the Bain Agency's photostream:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5051561702/]
